dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 1025 IH: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 2600 Wesley Street in Greenville, Texas, as the “Cooper Dawson Post Office Building”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Self (for himself, Mr. Jackson of Texas, and Mr. McCaul) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 2600 Wesley Street in Greenville, Texas, as the Cooper Dawson Post Office Building.

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 2600 Wesley Street in Greenville, Texas, shall be known and designated as the Cooper Dawson Post Office Building.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Cooper Dawson Post Office Building.
